predictions.text: Between 2025-09-05 and 2025-09-20, the S&P 500 Index (SPX) will set at least three new all-time closing highs.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count trading days in 2025-09-05 through 2025-09-20 where the official SPX closing level strictly exceeds every prior historical closing high. Use S&P Dow Jones Indices or major market data providers (Bloomberg/Refinitiv). Success if count >= 3.
evidence: S&P 500 hits record as falling yields offer relief, though bond market divergence warns of volatility.
ADP estimates U.S. added 54,000 jobs in August, underscoring cooling labor market ahead of payrolls.
predictions.rationale: Easing yields and softer labor data support multiple incremental highs amid momentum and systematic inflows.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-05 close to 2025-09-20 close, Broadcom (AVGO) will outperform iShares Semiconductor ETF (SOXX) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using a consistent data source (e.g., Yahoo Finance or Bloomberg), compute adjusted-close percentage returns for AVGO and SOXX from 2025-09-05 close to 2025-09-20 close. Success if AVGO_return − SOXX_return >= 3.0 percentage points.
evidence: Broadcom jumps on mystery $10B AI customer and strong AI sales growth, reinforcing semiconductor demand strength.
monitoring_signals: Analyst target and estimate revisions for AVGO
predictions.rationale: Fresh catalysts and upward estimate revisions tend to drive short-term post-earnings relative outperformance.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-05 close to 2025-09-30 close, T. Rowe Price (TROW) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 6.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using a consistent data source (e.g., Yahoo Finance or Bloomberg), compute adjusted-close percentage returns for TROW and SPY from 2025-09-05 close to 2025-09-30 close. Success if TROW_return − SPY_return >= 6.0 percentage points.
evidence: T. Rowe Price spikes after $1B Goldman investment, signaling strategic capital partnerships in asset management.
predictions.rationale: A major strategic investment and potential capital actions can fuel multi-week outperformance versus the broad market.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–New York weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-09-26 will be at least 10% higher than the 2025-08-29 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the Drewry WCI Shanghai–New York rate published on or before 2025-09-26 with the rate published on 2025-08-29 on Drewry’s website. Success if the later reading is >= 10% higher than the 2025-08-29 reading.
evidence: Global shipping disruptions and security risks have been supporting higher transpacific spot rates in recent weeks.
Sustained Red Sea/Bab el-Mandeb risk is redirecting traffic and tightening capacity on key lanes.
monitoring_signals: UKMTO incident reports for Red Sea/Gulf of Aden
predictions.rationale: Persistent security and capacity pressures tend to transmit faster to US East Coast rates than the composite.

predictions.text: The 10-Year Breakeven Inflation Rate (FRED: T10YIE) will close at or below 2.20% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using the FRED series T10YIE, success if any daily close on or before 2025-09-30 is <= 2.20%.
evidence: S&P 500 hits record as falling yields offer relief, indicating a bid for duration and disinflation pricing.
ADP estimates U.S. added 54,000 jobs in August, hinting at cooling demand and easing inflation pressure.
predictions.rationale: Cooling growth signals and declining yields raise odds of a downtick in market-based inflation expectations.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31 (UTC), NOAA SWPC will record at least one X1.0-class or stronger solar flare.
predictions.verification_criteria: NOAA SWPC solar event lists or daily reports must show at least one flare of class X1.0 or higher occurring between now and 2025-10-31 (UTC).
evidence: NOAA’s Space Weather Prediction Center will issue G3 (Strong) watch/warning by 2025-10-31, indicating elevated solar activity.
Solar Cycle 25 is near peak in 2025, increasing frequency of major flares.
predictions.rationale: Solar maximum conditions heighten the baseline probability of at least one X-class flare over a two-month window.

predictions.text: ICE UK Emissions Allowance (UKA) December-2025 futures will settle at or above £44.00 per metric ton at least once by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE settlement data for UK ETS December-2025 futures. Success if any official daily settlement on or before 2025-10-31 is >= 44.00 GBP/tonne.
evidence: Orsted sues to save offshore wind farm from administration cancellation, spotlighting renewable policy uncertainty.
Energy market tightness and European gas risks can lift carbon prices; UKA often correlates with EUA direction.
monitoring_signals: UK power demand and generation mix
predictions.rationale: Policy and energy-price volatility can catalyze a test of nearby resistance in UKA within the horizon.
